          <title>
            <string language="en">Movement of tectonic plates by convection currents</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung der tectonic Platten durch 
Konvektionströme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement des plats tectoniques par des courants 
de convection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento de placas tectonic por correntes do 
convection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento delle piastre tettoniche dalle correnti
di convezione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετακίνηση των τεκτονικών πιάτων από τα ρεύματα 
μεταφοράς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento de placas tectónicas por las 
corrientes de la convección</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how the movement of tectonic plates is caused by slow convection currents in the Earth's mantle.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">convection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mantle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tectonic plates</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie die Bewegung der 
tectonic Platten durch langsame Konvektionströme im Umhang der Masse 
verursacht wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment le mouvement 
des plats tectoniques est provoqué par les courants lents de 
convection dans le manteau de la terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como o movimento de 
placas tectonic é causado por correntes lentas do convection no 
mantle da terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come il movimento 
delle piastre tettoniche è causato dalle correnti lente di convezione
nel manto della terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς η μετακίνηση των 
τεκτονικών πιάτων προκαλείται από τα αργά ρεύματα μεταφοράς στο
γήινο μανδύα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo el movimiento de 
placas tectónicas es causado por las corrientes lentas de la 
convección en la capa de la tierra.</string>
          </description>
